verses.roman:
āmāra nikaṭe ei puṣpera udyāne
eka-khāni ghara āche parama-nirjane

synonyms: āmāra nikaṭe—nearby My place; ei—this; puṣpera udyāne—in a garden of flowers; eka-khāni—one; ghara—room; āche—there is; parama-nirjane—in a very solitary place.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu then said, "Nearby My place, in this garden of flowers, is a single room that is very solitary.
